name: classicality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being classical (= traditional), especially in relation to music and art: The painter presented himself as a champion of modernism, in opposition to classicality. There is a classicality about the composer's final works that stems from his admiration of masters such as Mozart.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a classicality about much of his later work that can make it seem very restrained.Chopin's classicality restricted each of his "Etudes" to one basic aspect of technique.
